channel.title: Assessment Results Model on OSCAL
channel.description: Recent content in Assessment Results Model on OSCAL

item.title: Assessment Results Model JSON Format Outline
item.description: + assessment-results: [1]{… } - assessment-results: [1]{ uuid: uuid [1], + metadata: [1]{… }, - metadata: [1]{ title: markup-line [1], published: dateTime-with-timezone [0 or 1], last-modified: dateTime-with-timezone [1], version: string [1], oscal-version: string [1], + revision-history: [0 to ∞]{… }, - revision-history: [0 to ∞]{ title: markup-line [0 or 1], published: dateTime-with-timezone [0 or 1], last-modified: dateTime-with-timezone [0 or 1], version: string [0 or 1],

item.title: Assessment Results Model JSON Format Reference
item.description: Schema download oscal_assessment-results_schema.json Schema version 1.0.0-milestone3 Short name oscal-ar The OSCAL assessment results format is used to describe the information typically provided by an assessor following an assessment. The root of the OSCAL assessment results format is assessment-results. Switch to XML activity-uuid Name Activity ID Description Links the task to a defined activity. A string property (type uuid). This object appears as a property on: task. Switch to XML addr-line Name Address line

item.title: OSCAL Assessment Results Model XML Format Outline
item.description: + <assessment-results uuid="uuid"> [1]… </assessment-results> - <assessment-results uuid="uuid"> [1] + <metadata> [1]… </metadata> - <metadata> [1] <title>markup-line</title> [1] <published>dateTime-with-timezone</published> [0 or 1] <last-modified>dateTime-with-timezone</last-modified> [1] <version>string</version> [1] <oscal-version>string</oscal-version> [1] + <revision-history>[0 or 1]… </revision-history> - <revision-history>[0 or 1] + <revision> [1 to ∞]… </revision> - <revision> [1 to ∞] <title>markup-line</title> [0 or 1] <published>dateTime-with-timezone</published> [0 or 1] <last-modified>dateTime-with-timezone</last-modified> [0 or 1] <version>string</version> [0 or 1] <oscal-version>string</oscal-version> [0 or 1]

item.title: OSCAL Assessment Results Model XML Format Reference
item.description: Schema download oscal_assessment-results_schema.xsd Schema version 1.0.0-milestone3 Short name oscal-ar XML namespace http://csrc.nist.gov/ns/oscal/1.0 The OSCAL assessment results format is used to describe the information typically provided by an assessor following an assessment. The root of the OSCAL assessment results format is assessment-results. Switch to JSON activity-uuid Name Activity ID Description Links the task to a defined activity. An element (uuid) This element appears inside: task. Switch to JSON addr-line Name Address line
